text: Pavel Serg. Savvich(Russian, Павел Сергеевич Саввич, 15 February 1857 – 1917) was an Imperial Russian regimental, division and corps commander. He served twice as governor of Kiev Governorate in modern-day Ukraine. ==Awards== *Order of Saint Anna, 4th class, 1877 *Order of Saint Stanislaus (House of Romanov), 3rd class, 1878 *Order of Saint Anna, 3rd class, 1879 *Order of Saint Stanislaus (House of Romanov), 2nd class, 1879 *Order of Saint Anna, 2nd class, 1885 *Order of Saint Vladimir, 4th class, 1894 *Order of Saint Vladimir, 3rd class, 1896 *Order of Saint Stanislaus (House of Romanov), 1st class, 1902 *Order of Saint Anna, 1st class, 1907 *Order of Saint Vladimir, 2nd class, 1911 *Order of the White Eagle (Russian Empire), 1914 ==References== * Современная Россия в портретах и биографиях выдающихся деятелей. — Санкт-Петербург, 1904. — С. 100. title: Pavel Savvich
